transcript: 38-year-old female with blunt chest trauma. Multiple rib fractures and possible lung injury. Patient is conscious but in severe pain. Blood pressure is 100/65. Heart rate is 110. Need trauma activation for blunt chest trauma.
activation_page: Trauma activation for 38-year-old female with blunt chest trauma. Multiple rib fractures and possible lung injury. Patient conscious, stable vitals. Trauma team activation required.
